name: advance
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cleantalk.
Tool description: CleanTalk API is a content validation service that helps you filter out profanity and obscenity in your user-generated content. 
API description: This function makes a GET request to the cleantalk1.p.rapidapi.com service with specified parameters and returns the response.

fill_char.description: A character to fill within the text.
